Comments_List: Understanding of how econ papers are constructed and what assumptions go into them. Getting to know some of the pretty thorny issues in the climate impacts field.
Great review of the climate change literature, and replication is a great idea for a course.

Could be better organized, especially with assignments, managing the projects, and pairing up teams. Should ask students to read all the papers beforehand and do a speed dating match based on people's technical abilities.
Earlier notification of assignments and deadlines, but that would have been hard since this course is still in development.
Yes, replication is really important and a great way to learn a new literature.
